node.doctext:
'Survival, sanity and excellence where possible.' If you are a teacher or educator and this sounds like the motto for you, then come and join us at SchoolDaze. Please feel free to enthuse about your advanced French class, moan about your rebellious and disaffected Year 9s, de-stress over the increasing mountains of paperwork and share your secrets for making the Industrial Revolution interesting!



[{linkGroupMessages}]
node.title: SchoolDaze
